name: Retrotron 3000
description: Retrotron 3000 is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and classic arms and legs, this robot brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its retroConsole buttons provide a sense of familiarity and ease of use, making it a favorite among enthusiasts. The laser screen of the Retrotron 3000 offers precise and accurate readings, perfect for analyzing and visualizing complex waveforms. With its unique blend of vintage design and advanced technology, Retrotron 3000 is a true marvel to behold.
